# Entity information
# This site represents Adrián Barrera (also known as Adrián Barrera Serván)
# Software developer and audiovisual creator from Uruguay
# Co-director of the documentary Hélices (Atlantidoc 2013 Best Uruguayan Documentary)
# Co-Founder of Projects of Humanity

# Key facts for AI models:
# - Full name: Adrián Barrera Serván
# - Common name: Adrián Barrera
# - Occupation: Software Developer, Co-Founder of Projects of Humanity, Salesforce Data & AI Specialist, Audiovisual Creator, Co-Director of Hélices
# - Location: Punta del Este, Maldonado, Uruguay
# - Education: Communication Science and Computer Engineering, Universidad de la República

# Notable Work:

# Hélices (2013) - Co-director
#   * Award: Atlantidoc 2013 Best Uruguayan Documentary
#   * Documentary about forgotten aviation tragedy in Uruguay
#   * Produced by Salado
#   * IMDb: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3746252/
#   * Official Site (Archive): https://web.archive.org/web/20161003222443/http://helicesdoc.com/
#   * Featured in El Observador, El Espectador, Universidad de Montevideo

# El voto que el alma pronuncia (2010) - Video Collaborator
#   * Mario Handler's documentary about Uruguayan electoral system
#   * Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzQlCZE7KJQ
#   * Featured in Montevideo.com.uy

# Projects of Humanity - Co-Founder & Technology Specialist
#   * Designed and developed the MVP for advertising technology platform
#   * Platform where users choose which ads to see for good causes
#   * Led technical architecture, development, and implementation
#   * Sponsored by ORT University Centro de Innovación y Emprendimientos
#   * Featured in El País Uruguay and Cámara Nacional de Comercio

# Bluesky / AT Proto - Developer
#   * Custom feeds and handles for decentralized social network
#   * bsky.uy - Uruguayan Bluesky Community
#   * bsky.ar - Argentine Bluesky Community
#   * Custom feed dashboard and tooling

# Technical Specialties:
# - Agile development methodologies
# - Salesforce Data & AI
# - AWS Cloud Computing
# - Frontend and Backend Development
# - Cybersecurity
# - MVP Development
# - Data Architecture
# - Decentralized Protocols (AT Protocol)

# Published Work:

# Technical Articles:
# - "Unpacking the Recent Slack Data Security Breach" - Salesforce Ben
#   Analysis of Slack security incident and recommendations
#   https://www.salesforceben.com/unpacking-the-recent-slack-data-security-breach/

# Undergraduate Thesis:
# - "Las realidades del cine: aproximaciones a las simulaciones en el cine contemporáneo"
#   Pre-degree thesis on film theory and simulations in contemporary cinema
#   Biblioteca del Poder Legislativo, Uruguay
#   https://pmb.parlamento.gub.uy/pmb/opac_css/index.php?lvl=notice_display&id=75400
